message.subject: Enron/GLOBE
message.content:
M1.1. Dear Drs. Roberts and Benjamin,
[Conventional: salutation]
M1.2. Vince Kaminski and I enjoyed and appreciated the opportunity to speak with
you this morning.
[Inform: Chrstie and Vince enjoyed speaking with Drs. Roberts and Benjamin]
M1.3. Enron is very happy to agree to participate in Stanford's
GLOBE project (being conducted in partnership with McKinsey & Company).
[Inform: Enron is happy to participate in Stanford's GLOBE project]
M1.4. Attached please find my business card with all of my contact information.
[Inform: Christie's business card is attached]
M1.5. I look forward to hearing from Dr. Benjamin in the near future to begin
Enron's involvement.
[Inform: Christie looks forward to hearing from Dr. Benjamin to begin Enron's involvement]
M1.6. Thank you!
[Conventional: thanks]
M1.7. --Christie.
[Conventional: signature]
